publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2919.1 Shona Robison: Scottish Parliament Salaries Scheme and Scottish Parliament Party Leaders' Allowances Scheme—As an amendment to motion (S1M-2919) in the name of John Young, after "the Scheme" insert "subject to the Scheme being amended as follows: in paragraph 2 (1) leave out "£48,228" and insert "£42,918", and in paragraph 5 leave out from "as specified" to end and insert "in accordance with an index determined by the Parliamentary corporation."" Supported by: Irene McGugan*, Nicola Sturgeon*
